word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指双方或多方订立的具有法律效力的正式的书面合同或契约。
指国家之间经外交谈判后依照国际法签订的正式条约。
普通用词，含义最确定，泛指个人、团体或国家之间取得一致而达成的任何协议、协定或合同、契约等，可以是口头的，也可以是书面的。
指不具约束力的非正式的协议。
比treaty更专门化，但不及treaty正式。也可指国家之间就有关事情签订的条约。
多指国际间的非正式协议。
通常指商业交往中的购销合同。

word_group.brief_definition: 相互了解；互相理解；互相谅解
谅解备忘录；理解备忘录；学术合作备忘录
更了解；更多理解；更深刻的理解
深刻理解；深入理解；深层了解
充分认识；充分了解；完全理解
自然语言理解；自然语言分析；自然语言处理
理解有限；有限的理解；认识有限

bilingual.source: Make notes about your understanding of the saying.
bilingual.target: 记录你对这句话的理解。

bilingual.source: I can have a better understanding of English movies.
bilingual.target: 我可以更好地理解英语电影。

bilingual.source: Explain your understanding of the saying "Seeing is believing".
bilingual.target: 解释你对“眼见为实”这句话的理解。

bilingual.source: Confucius said that learning without understanding leads to confusion.
bilingual.target: 孔子说过学习而不理解会导致困惑。

bilingual.source: Students often have trouble understanding different English accents.
bilingual.target: 学生们经常难以理解不同的英语口音。

bilingual.source: The first question is about understanding English films and songs.
bilingual.target: 第一个问题是关于理解英语电影和歌曲。

bilingual.source: To express my understanding, I can use words and expressions.
bilingual.target: 为了表达我的理解，我可以使用单词和表达。

bilingual.source: To express my understanding, I can explain the benefits of hobbies.
bilingual.target: 为了表达我的理解，我可以解释爱好的好处。

bilingual.source: To express my understanding, I can describe the importance of plants.
bilingual.target: 为了表达我的理解，我可以描述植物的重要性。

bilingual.source: My daughter was more understanding, although she also felt sad to part with certain toys.
bilingual.target: 我的女儿更能理解，尽管她也为放弃某些玩具感到难过。

list.abstract: Understanding，中文名称是谅解，歌手Xscape创作并演唱的歌曲，该曲是同名专辑《Understanding》第三首歌。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for understanding. Of course I understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你理解我。我当然理解。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my understanding that it was a suicide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就我理解，那是自杀。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for understanding, sir. Yes, thank you so much. We really appreciate it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢您的理解，长官。非常感谢。我们真的很感激。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be too sure about that, I have a great deal of understanding. God. Will be on my ears.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别那么肯定，我很擅长理解。天啊，我会留意的。

yingyinNormal.en: And through understanding each other's popular cultures, we gain insight into each other's hearts and true selves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过理解对方的流行文化，我们看到了对方的内心和真实的自我。

yingyinNormal.en: What if being evil is more fun than being good? What if being evil changes your understanding of what fun is?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果变坏比做好人要有趣得多呢？如果变坏改变了你对有趣的理解呢？

yingyinNormal.en: In this era of instability and intolerance, we need to promote better understanding through the power of music.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这个动荡和冲突的时代，我们需要通过音乐的力量，促进更好的理解。

yingyinNormal.en: As a theory for understanding the human mind, perhaps, but not as a blueprint for building an artificial one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为理解人类心智的理论，也许是吧，但作为创造机器人的蓝图，依然是可用的。

yingyinNormal.en: If it holds up, this first evidence for the detection of gravitational waves will deepen our understanding of the birth of the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果证明属实，引力波探测的这第一个证据将会加深我们对宇宙诞生的理解。

yingyinNormal.en: You have the finest legal mind in this country, a deep understanding of the Constitution, and the Republicans wouldn't dare block your nomination.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有我国最强的法律头脑，对宪法理解很透彻，共和党不敢阻止你提名。

yingyinNormal.en: Here we have a highly gifted researcher in the field of particle physics whose work has brought him to the precipice of forever changing mankind's understanding of the universe. AKA me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一位在粒子物理学领域的超级天才科学家，他的成就关乎全人类的命运，从此改变对宇宙的理解，确切来说就是我。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at these men. They've managed to win the top science prize in the world with no more understanding of the quantum underpinnings of the expansion of the early universe than God gave a goose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看看这些人，他们成功赢得了国际科学界的最高奖项，可是他们对早期宇宙膨胀的量子基础的理解还不如傻子懂得多。

yingyinNormal.en: Naturally, people can't appreciate what they can't see, just as we all have different ranges for singing, hearing pitch, and seeing colors, we have different ranges for seeing and understanding things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自然人们就不会承认看不到的事，正如同我们都有不同的音域听觉频率和颜色识别能力，我们看待和理解事物的范围均有不同。

yingyinNormal.en: Realizing that made me a hyper-realist, by which I mean I became someone who has discovered the great rewards of deeply understanding, accepting, and working with reality as it is, and not as I wish it would be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意识到这一点我变得非常现实，我的意思是说通过深度理解接受并真正处理现实，而不是想当然地处理现实，我从中获益匪浅。

yingyinNormal.en: My understanding from our engineers. My engineers!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从我们的工匠那里了解到。我的工匠。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm understanding, but let's not get carried away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能体谅你，但我们别太在意了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my understanding there is a condition attached.
yingyinNormal.zh: 据我所知是有条件的。

yingyinNormal.en: Not until we have a better understanding of what we're dealing with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 直到我们弄清楚我们在做什么。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for being so understanding, Dad. I know you'll keep him safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢你这么善解人意，爸爸，我知道你会保护好他的。

yingyinNormal.en: What'd he say? His answering machine was very understanding. I feel blue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他怎么说？他的答录机很能体谅我，好沮丧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 理解; 领悟; 了解

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
v. 理解；懂得；了解；默认；认识到；明了；听说；（understand的过去式和过去分词）
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.zh: 理解; 领悟; 了解

examination_example.sentence: Yet this <highlight>understanding</highlight> is outdated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而这种理解已经过时了。

examination_example.sentence: Good governance rests on an <highlight>understanding</highlight> of the inherent worth of each individual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 善政基于对每个人内在价值的理解。

examination_example.sentence: When our time of mourning is over, we press forward, stronger with a greater <highlight>understanding</highlight> and respect for life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们哀悼的时间结束时，我们继续生活下去，变得更加坚强，并对生命有更多的理解和尊重。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 相互了解；互相理解；互相谅解

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
adv. 可理解地
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: knowledge about a subject, situation, or others or about how something works
sense_info_list.zh: 领悟; 理解; 了解

examination_example.sentence: It promotes mutual <highlight>understanding</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它促进相互理解。

examination_example.sentence: The books we share with young children can be a valuable opportunity to develop children's <highlight>understanding</highlight> of themselves and others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们和孩子们分享书籍是一个宝贵机会，能够培养孩子对自己和他人的理解。

examination_example.sentence: As such, they are key species for <highlight>understanding</highlight> and predicting impacts of global change on Antarctic and sub-Antarctic marine ecosystems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，它们是帮助人类了解和预测全球变化对南极和南极海洋生态系统影响的关键物种。

sense_info_list.en: the particular way in which someone understands something
sense_info_list.zh: 理解; 看法; 解释; 意见

examination_example.sentence: Marconi was central to our present-day <highlight>understanding</highlight> of communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马可尼对我们当今的对于交流的理解至关重要。

examination_example.sentence: Marconi was quite simply the central figure in the emergence of a modern <highlight>understanding</highlight> of communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi只是现代传播理解出现的中心人物。

examination_example.sentence: This can help develop <highlight>understanding</highlight>, acceptance and appreciation of diversity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这有助于培养对多样性的理解、接受和欣赏。

sense_info_list.zh: 通情达理的; 善解人意的

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>understanding</highlight> leadership.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个通情达理的领导班子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 理解; 看法; 解释; 意见
领悟; 理解; 了解

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
adv. 可理解地
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: the particular way in which someone understands something
sense_info_list.zh: 理解; 看法; 解释; 意见

examination_example.sentence: Like other outsiders, I was continually impressed by their superior <highlight>understanding</highlight> of the ecology we shared.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像其他局外人一样，他们对我们共享生态的卓越理解不断给我留下深刻印象。

examination_example.sentence: Many patients also gained a better <highlight>understanding</highlight> of the illnesses that landed them in the hospital in the first place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多患者也对最初让他们住进医院的疾病有了更好的了解。

examination_example.sentence: They have a good <highlight>understanding</highlight> of evolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对进化有很好的理解。

sense_info_list.en: knowledge about a subject; situation; or others or about how something works
sense_info_list.zh: 领悟; 理解; 了解

examination_example.sentence: It's not the knowledge that is valuable, It's the practice of learning new things and <highlight>understanding</highlight> how things work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有价值的并不是知识本身，而是学习新事物和理解事物如何运作的实践。

examination_example.sentence: According to a newly published study, cats seem to be able to predict the location of hiding prey (猎物) using both their ears and an inborn (天生的) <highlight>understanding</highlight> of how the physical world works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项最新发表的研究，猫咪似乎能够利用它们的耳朵和对物理世界运作的天生理解来预测隐藏的猎物的位置。

examination_example.sentence: While preparing to teach, they organize their knowledge and improve their own <highlight>understanding</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在备课的同时，他们梳理知识，增进理解。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 领悟; 理解; 了解

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 误解；误会；（misunderstand的过去式）
n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: knowledge about a subject, situation, or others or about how something works
sense_info_list.zh: 领悟; 理解; 了解

examination_example.sentence: a better <highlight>understanding</highlight> of children
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对儿童有更好的了解

examination_example.sentence: To help our audience have a better <highlight>understanding</highlight> of this extreme weather, we have invited Prof. Torres to our studio this evening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了帮助观众更好地了解这种极端天气，我们今晚邀请了托雷斯教授来到演播室。

sense_info_list.en: the particular way in which someone understands something

examination_example.sentence: Wang's works show a deep <highlight>understanding</highlight> of modern architecture and a good knowledge of traditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 王的作品体现了对现代建筑的深刻理解和对传统的深刻认识。

examination_example.sentence: A nurse who understands the healing (治愈) value of silence can use this <highlight>understanding</highlight> to assist in the care of patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解静默治疗功效的护士都可以把此方法运用到病人护理工作中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
v. 理解；懂得；了解；默认；认识到；明了；听说；（understand的过去式和过去分词）
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

examination_example.sentence: This book will give you a better <highlight>understanding</highlight> of Chinese foods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这本书会使你更好地了解中国食物。

examination_example.sentence: Different dress could be one way of showing their <highlight>understanding</highlight> of beauty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不同的服装可能是他们理解美的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: No matter how old you get, there will always be things beyond your <highlight>understanding</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管你多大，总有一些事情是你无法理解的。

examination_example.sentence: He's patient and <highlight>understanding</highlight>, and he cares a lot about people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他有耐心，善解人意，而且很关心别人。

examination_example.sentence: Be <highlight>understanding</highlight>. Try to understand what other people are facing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 善解人意些。试着去理解其他人面临的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Helen treats her students in a patient and <highlight>understanding</highlight> way．
examination_example.sentence_trans: Helen以耐心和善解人意的方式对待她的学生。
